short list.translation[0].definitions[0]: a list of the most suitable people for a job or a prize, chosen from all the people who were first considered
The panel will draw up a shortlist of candidates.
Davies was on the shortlist for the Booker Prize.
short list.translation[1].definitions[0]: to put someone on a short list for a job or a prize
She’s been short-listed for the director’s job.
